content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia Müller, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask what you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Could you tell me the price you are asking for?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Emilia. The rental price for the apartment is 800 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month.

Thank you for your understanding.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: You're welcome, Emilia. I'm glad that we could come to an agreement. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
